column1: We believe she can actually cut through the obstacles and move forward; that her Midwestern grit is a reason for hope.  We endorse Amy Klobuchar.  @qctimes knows what we in Minnesota already know: @amyklobuchar is the leader our nation needs in 2020! https://t.co/SpR3nwNQE7

Join us this morning to make phone calls inviting your neighbors to support Angie! Stop by our office in Eagan at 11 AM or 2 PM — we'll be glad to see you there.   Click below to learn more and sign up! https://t.co/Kodjfr7iRe
Hey D.C. — this is what a REAL winter storm looks like! https://t.co/6cAXitc30V
The burden of this trade war falls on those who least deserve it: hardworking American families. That’s just one of the many reasons it needs to come to an end — now. https://t.co/4n0HUuxg4L
Got to vote for @amyklobuchar this morning and I’m glad to be spending my evening with her celebrating the start of early voting with such an energized crowd of supporters! https://t.co/r9wCnT8YXQ

In case you needed another reminder it’s a Presidential election year … and early voting is open! I’m proud to have just cast my vote in the Presidential primary for our current Senator future President and incredible candidate @amyklobuchar! https://t.co/yid20nvHcQ
Honored to spend tonight supporting our future leaders with @serve_america and @sethmoulton! https://t.co/c6UUc9Babu
Just tuning in to see @amyklobuchar stand out again in tonight's #DemDebate!

Rising inequality and low pay hurts working families. The 2017 Tax Scam only made the problem worse. We must keep fighting so that every family can achieve the American Dream — not just those at the top. https://t.co/JNhVRRLI2N

Craig also spends her time here in the district meeting with our veterans small business owners farmers and local leaders ... In short she is doing the work she was elected to do.  Thanks for your letter MaryKay. Doing this work is my pleasure! https://t.co/QvgpiDngHg
Can't wait for kickoff! #SKOL https://t.co/Hk7Jt184IM

Congratulations to Minnesota's newest labor leaders: SE Area Labor Council President @pommellawegmann and MN AFL-CIO ED @bethanywinkels. Minnesota is lucky to have strong women leading the way! Proud to call you both friends. https://t.co/q5mbMHgqaX
Grateful to have the support of @bradybuzz. We must come together to find commonsense measures to address gun violence and keep our kids safe.

Start 2020 off right and join Team Angie for our first Day of Action of the year!    Join us on Sunday January 19 at 11am or 2pm to make phone calls or to knock doors. Angie will be kicking off the 2pm shift!   Click the link below to confirm your time >> https://t.co/4VbBjpmxYk

In recent years we've all felt the effects of rising temperatures and worsening flood seasons. We need bipartisan solutions to climate change not wholesale destruction of existing policy. https://t.co/ge1fWdEHsR
Can’t wait to work together to get @BradTabke re-elected! An awesome representative for our community. https://t.co/6SjmwPQFUn

It should have been a banner year for our pork producers ... until the trade war stopped sales cold. The Administration needs to stop this hogwash and let our farmers get back to business. https://t.co/m1W1HoMzCc
#SKOL !
We're ready at our house! #skolvikings https://t.co/8IvQAjarjB
It's time to hold Big Pharma accountable.

Big Pharma is set to continue to boost it profits in 2020 on the backs of Minnesota families. A "below 10%" price increase is still unacceptable for brand name drugmakers. This is why the House passed HR3 to force drugmakers to negotiate its drug pricing. https://t.co/DFKC2eqAwV
I will never agree to go back to a time when insurance companies could discriminate against our families due to a pre-existing condition.
Healthcare needs fixing for sure but we can't allow Congressional Republicans to dismantle it without a plan. Playing politics with healthcare is hurting Minnesota families.   https://t.co/gHpDDwfWd3
As my first year in Congress comes to a close I want to give thanks to my first supporter and the woman who inspired me to always keep fighting. Thank you Mom! https://t.co/AjHZn6IDcn
Congratulations to the Golden Gophers on their big win today and an incredible season! #rowtheboat #skiumah  https://t.co/SA2mSC41Oz
Thanks to everyone who came out tonight for our holiday and office opening party! Even in a snowstorm we had a full house of folks committed to keeping CD2 Blue in 2020! https://t.co/UxBIpYps8D

Trump's trade war isn't just failing farmers. A study out from the Federal Reserve finds that the tariffs on steel and aluminum led to job losses - not gains - in those industries in the US. Our workers deserve a cohesive effective trade policy.  https://t.co/AQS3o0NSJF
I can't believe you're getting ready for your senior year in college. Very proud of the man you've grown to be. Happy 21st Jacob! https://t.co/TuyUyvOHBB
Stay indoors and stay safe today! But if you do have to go out (you really shouldn't) bring your ice skates. https://t.co/TIa6hUKCag
Even at 22 with a beard and a fiance he's still my little boy. Happy Birthday to my favorite machinist! So proud of you Josh. https://t.co/g6lBd3RJtt
Wishing you a happy holiday season and peace and joy in the new year! https://t.co/IHlEqGeclX
There's much more work to do to reign in out of control drug costs but this was a step in the right direction.

This setback for Big Pharma was a huge win for everyone fighting to lower prescription drug prices. For too long Big Pharma has gotten everything they want in Washington - I'm proud to be part of a Congress willing to stand up to them.   https://t.co/fE7bU4WnVd

Iowa is in on Minnesota's secret - @amyklobuchar is the real deal! Midwest voters (you know the ones who vote in places like IA MI MN OH & WI) are signing up to support Amy in record numbers right now!  https://t.co/CEWdzlyL9f
How do we explain to our kids that they'll be paying off debt for their entire lives so that we could give corporations and the wealthiest Americans a massive tax cut?

It's been two years since the GOP pushed through the Tax Scam of 2017. In that time the middle class has seen little benefit the record growth has failed to materialize but our deficit is exploding.   https://t.co/sZbQR9u5C3
This is the Amy that Minnesota knows. Proud to call her my Senator and support her for our next President. https://t.co/xjGqEM3tbk

I was proud to support yesterday's package that repealed the so-called "Cadillac Tax" which penalized many workers who had organized to bargain for quality health insurance coverage.  https://t.co/JpqLvkZzcm

I'm glad to see our local communities taking action to stem the youth vaping epidemic. I remain committed to finding a bipartisan path to confronting this growing crisis nationwide.  https://t.co/Jkvo7tCDZr
Really @hallmark?! Looking forward to giving my wife a handmade card for our next anniversary #hallmarkchannel #hallmark https://t.co/tG59IlcAfz https://t.co/FFl9ZLOEhe

Very excited to see progress on restoring the SALT deduction. The President's cap of it in 2017 disproportionately impacted Minnesotans - it's return will put more money in the pockets of hardworking Minnesota families and boost our state's economy!  https://t.co/HDOlGX1M2A

Sadly Mitch McConnell has already vowed to add this to his ever expanding pile of important legislation that the Senate GOP refuses to take up. Americans should not stand for the do-nothing Senate. https://t.co/eaIl2bdOPh
I am incredibly proud that we passed HR 3 today with bipartisan support - a bill that would finally help reign in prescription drug costs.   https://t.co/eaIl2bdOPh
#USMCAnow #MN02 https://t.co/CSdiR1s8W7

The protections for working people are a vast improvement over NAFTA and we eliminated the give away to Big Pharma that would have made prescription drugs even more expensive. USMCA has now been endorsed by the AFL-CIO and I plan to enthusiastically support the new agreement.
I'm incredibly proud that we were able to push the administration and our trade partners to get a better deal for America on USMCA.  https://t.co/IrWrzWcPnR

We're excited to announce our Re-election 2020 Campaign Headquarters in Eagan! Join us on December 30th to ring in election year a day early and help officially open our 2020 Headquarters. We're hoping to see you here a lot next year! https://t.co/Hhw8EFaaDf

I'm excited to see groups like the Farm Bureau are partnering on climate-smart agriculture. Farmers know better than most of us about the impact of extreme weather across the country. Working together is the only way we'll slow global climate change. https://t.co/AA0WVnV0IU
This program needs to be fixed and it needs to happen now. No more excuses.  https://t.co/SKv5gMuNeH
It's an honor to share the stage with my colleague and friend Dean Phillips in support of the DFL tonight at the Founders Day dinner. Looking forward to Stacey Abrams up next! https://t.co/vlDYrXTD52

There's bipartisan consensus that Medicare should be negotiating drug prices. Our bill will lower costs and save us up to a trillion dollars. We can't allow it to end up in Mitch McConnell's legislative graveyard. https://t.co/1nxUQTIy9Y
Americans must hold Senate Republicans accountable for putting McConnell in charge.

Even where there's bipartisan agreement Mitch McConnell shuts down progress. In the House we've passed over 400 bills but even those with more than 100 Republican votes do not see the light of day in the Senate.   https://t.co/Q9Klfd3r7T

The Republican Tax Scam of 2017 continues to fail Americans. The Star Tribune  has this right - while many corporations see their tax rates fall to zero improvements and repairs to the infrastructure they count on are still on hold.  https://t.co/b86zoHG8qd

Many are bipartisan bills like the Background Checks Act of 2019 the Paycheck Fairness Act and my own Local Water Protection Act (which had 117 Republicans vote for it). It's time for the Senate to get to work - especially where there's already bipartisan agreement!
It’s been a productive year in the U.S. House. We’ve passed more than 400 bills since I was sworn in.   https://t.co/PEEOHMljyC
Already tuned in! #SkiUMah   https://t.co/yazADB9ip3
Wishing my son Jacob all the best working at Best Buy today!  https://t.co/46G58Vu0B7
I'm so proud to have the endorsement of @VictoryFund! Join them in supporting me today: https://t.co/E7rpXkwBou https://t.co/mFvFBTkzab

Thank you to everyone who showed up tonight for us in Eagan. So many people fired up to win in 2020! And a special thank you to my wife Cheryl for an incredible introduction tonight! https://t.co/6SIyZzRtDZ
So fun meeting so many Packers at dinner at the Kaposia Club in South St. Paul tonight during date night with Cheryl! https://t.co/CvruyalbHU

Our children's health and safety should be the highest priority but the Administration is siding with vaping lobbyists instead. It's deeply disappointing to see the President backing down on his promise to ban flavored e-cigarettes.  https://t.co/2kJFq8OgwH

I'm so proud to have earned Women Winning's support again for my 2020 campaign! I look forward to working side by side with them to continue electing women up and down the ballot across Minnesota.   https://t.co/2ZoTPuQoJ9
The Gophers are bringing home the bacon tonight! #RowTheBoat

I had a lot of fun addressing Victory Institute's #LGBTQleaders19 conference today! We've got a long way to go to reach equality so I'm incredibly thankful for the work they're doing to help us get there. https://t.co/9ACaoFalP7

We must end the epidemic of youth vaping. The dangers are real and immediate. I'm proud to be part of a bipartisan group working to find solve this crisis before more of our children are put at risk.  https://t.co/fTXwJzpY3C

A great visit to IUPAT District Council 82's training center today to talk about how we get more students involved in their incredible apprenticeship program. What an amazing facility! https://t.co/KxJ5qZGbg3
I always enjoyed visiting with Bruce at Farmfest especially each year. His advocacy for Minnesota's farmers will be missed but his legacy will live on in our Ag communities.  https://t.co/iptPfk5hAQ
Minnesota's unions are a strong force for working families and I'm proud to call them allies in the fight to give everyone a better shot at a good life.   https://t.co/DUIZJyxsd0

The trade war is a huge drain on Minnesota businesses - costing them $72M in September alone. Minnesota's small businesses and farmers can't afford to keep footing the bill for the Administration's trade war - they need a deal and it needs to be soon.  https://t.co/MB2Ulhu24g

#TBT What an incredible day a year ago. Starting the day in Wabasha crisscrossing the district talking to voters and firing up our volunteers then our victory party in Eagan. Thank you again to everyone in this amazing district for giving me the honor! https://t.co/JsWsHvpO3l
Be sure to get out to vote in your local elections today! https://t.co/lhuut9JMBC
Stopped by to see some great DFL friends this weekend and try my hand on the combine. Thanks for letting me drive Danny! https://t.co/Cjn9SnYMBa

The trickle down never happened the economy is continuing to slow and the deficit is exploding. We must roll back the GOP's massive tax giveaway to the wealthiest Americans and huge corporations and put this money to work growing our economy.  https://t.co/LKgFaAMcE8
Happy Halloween! https://t.co/nSZC1I3iUf

I'm glad to be part of the progress on reigning in prescription drugs costs. Big Pharma and their super PACs are already attacking so I know we're doing the right thing. We won't slow down.  https://t.co/itwelotBW6

With the economy continuing to slow it's critical that we pass a significant infrastructure package. Fixing and improving our aging infrastructure will create good paying jobs now and help our economy grow for years to come. Let's get this done!  https://t.co/VgjD7FyS1u
Thanks everyone from USW District 11 for allowing me to join you. Felt right at home tonight! https://t.co/NEoAhHq84N

We gave a trillion-dollar tax break to the wealthiest Americans and huge corporations and it's done little more than leave us even deeper in debt. We must refocus our tax policy on growing America's middle class - the true driver of economic growth. https://t.co/JlORw80Zxu
It's always a good weekend when part of it is spent with the Teamsters. Thank you to the stewards of Local 320 for the opportunity to visit with you this morning! https://t.co/zLB0s0gzhH
I can't imagine this journey through life without you. Happy anniversary to an amazing wife mother and human. https://t.co/VdiNpiAl16
It's clear that the only thing standing in the way of universal background checks are GOP lawmakers and their NRA backers. https://t.co/qFEwA1rnoF

I'm glad to hear that Dakota County is leading in helping people who need Medicaid waivers get the care they need but we need to do better as a state. Geography cannot dictate a family's access to the life altering help they need.   https://t.co/R7B3B8MwgE

It was great to stop by IBEW Local 110 yesterday to catch up about their priorities and talk more about the great opportunity that their apprenticeship program offers people in our area. Thank you again for your support! https://t.co/8ZGut9MZNe
Congratulations to you both @Abby4Iowa and Dan! Wishing you two the best! https://t.co/AANrHdxg9f

I hope for the sake of farmers and small business owners in communities like ours across America that the President succeeds in this trade deal. It'll be a start to undoing some of the damage he's inflicted on the families who depend on our ag economy.  https://t.co/ufp4qqTwoz

These deaths are tragic. I'm cosponsoring legislation and working with a bipartisan group of Members to help prevent tragedies like these and stop the epidemic of youth nicotine addiction in our country.  https://t.co/UIvVrPAB6z
Hannah and Dave have continued Ann's legacy as strong allies helping to push toward equality.

It was an honor to recognize Hannah and Dave Edwards the first ever Ann Kaner-Roth Ally for Equality Award recipients at tonight's HRC Twin Cities Dinner. Ann was a good friend and an incredible ally touching the lives of so many in Minnesota's LGBTQ+ community. https://t.co/QdALkhjgqE
Always fun to stop by and say hi to the committed activists of the SD51 DFL on a Saturday morning. Thanks for all of your hard work! https://t.co/0CiVBkmL3w

The GOP's war on Title X funding is making it much harder for women to access basic healthcare across the country. I'm proud to be fighting back against this and proud to have the support of @PPact in my reelection campaign! https://t.co/UTvB56RrRe

Our tax policy is clearly very broken. A start to fixing it is rolling back the Republican Tax Scam of 2017. America's working families can't afford to continue to subsidize this giveaway to the super-rich.  https://t.co/0mg06mcmGB
I stand ready to work with the administration to lower the price of healthcare and prescription drugs and to work together to build a transportation and infrastructure plan for the 21st Century.
Across our district hardworking Minnesotans are seeing their way of life slipping away. Its time to end the trade war and work to open new markets to trade.

I’d like to welcome the Vice President to the Second District today. I hope that he and the President will spend time with small business owners and family farmers who have been negatively affected by tariffs and small refinery waivers. https://t.co/gq0vduvD8B

Thank you to Chairman Peter DeFazio for joining me and our partners in organized labor today for a great conversation about rebuilding Minnesota's infrastructure. This is critical to creating good paying jobs in our district. https://t.co/Nt38FCGUad
Help us give the Vice President a proper welcome to the Second. Chip in to keep our district blue: https://t.co/7rbCNutsf1  https://t.co/2grS7cHKcQ

I was thrilled to see my friend - and future colleague - @danielfeehan at the Rice County DFL fundraiser today. Thanks to everyone who showed up committed to keeping Rice County blue in 2020! https://t.co/OVN4szk4Gk

Next year the trade war is projected to cost each American $2000. And it's not just higher prices people are losing their jobs and businesses - especially in the Midwest. We can't continue to shoulder the burden for Trump's failing trade war.  https://t.co/KTCk4zXpH4

From the article: "More than half of CEOs from the largest U.S. companies said last month that trade policy had had a negative impact on their sales and one-third reported a negative impact on hiring"  https://t.co/qn5vzI9dkO

Trump's tariffs aren't just hurting America's farmers they're also holding back our small businesses and crippling American manufacturers who've had their worst year since 2009. It's time to make a deal and end the trade war.  https://t.co/qn5vzI9dkO
Looking forward to seeing you tomorrow or you could come to one of my monthly town halls! https://t.co/9fnY1QCgqW

Dan has the proven leadership experience to provide real solutions for his community and with a cycle of name recognition behind him the second time's the charm. I proudly endorse Dan’s campaign and look forward to working with him in Congress! https://t.co/wQfKVDakIJ
Can't wait to get mine!  https://t.co/CSAer00NFH

This is going to be one of the toughest races in the country and with everything going on in Washington we can’t fall short right now. Please chip in before our FEC deadline tonight at midnight!  https://t.co/89HUmbSjzP

The ACA isn't perfect but it's saving lives.  We have to work together to fix what's broken - and make sure the GOP does not succeed in their efforts to repeal the progress we've made. https://t.co/uGcdupchDY
The @NRCC has attack ads up in my district because I stood up for our democracy and national security. Let the NRCC know you're ready to fight to protect our democracy: https://t.co/qoAuKWTRUz

.@NRCC is taking the really low road this cycle. I was hopeful that with fellow Minnesotan @tomemmer in charge we could expect better. @tomemmer owes @JoeCunninghamSC and his family an apology. This is definitely not Minnesota nice.  https://t.co/YVVfqUOpcZ

It's been a fun night with my friend and colleague @VoteBetty and a table of Minnesotans who are supporting the important work that @Defenders are doing. Thank you for the opportunity to learn more about your mission and work! https://t.co/kZUQsRJFQV
Game on next summer Senator! https://t.co/VOdjsdzgg6

Congrats @Twins on winning the AL Central last night and becoming the first team to hit 300 homers in a season today! I'm also excited to watch @MNUFC in their first ever MLS playoffs after last night's huge win - it's been a great 24 hours for MN sports!  https://t.co/rOO9DS9BW4

We must find a bipartisan path forward on reducing the price of drugs. This is what the people we represent sent us here to do and we must put our politics aside and move forward for our communities.  https://t.co/K59zo4DdQU
The notes of the call have confirmed this. https://t.co/bmVpftPHLb
National Republicans are already saying that putting our country first and standing up for what's right will cost me my seat. Let's make sure they're wrong: https://t.co/qoAuKWTRUz
That's why I have called for fair and impartial impeachment proceedings to begin.

This is different. When a sitting president admits to asking a foreign government to help his personal attorney dig up dirt on a political opponent while withholding military aid to that nation our national security is placed at risk. https://t.co/a1auzkPWxU
We won because we didn’t just talk to Democrats. We talked to everyone. And I'm looking forward to running just as hard in 2020 with all of you by my side again!

We won this seat together by wearing out the soles of our shoes knocking on every door then we knocked them again. We won because we didn’t stop when we finished talking with our neighbors instead we drove to the next community and talked with their neighbors.

Thank you to 2nd Congressional District DFL for all of your help to get here - it was an honor to speak at your Fall Classic Dinner for the first time as a member of Congress tonight. https://t.co/TbmcaGn4xF

Congratulations to Dodge Nature Center on a wonderful event this evening! Our community is lucky to have this gem right in the heart of Dakota County. Thank you to everyone who showed up tonight to make sure we can continue to enjoy this treasure for years to come. https://t.co/NKTYEYmIGw
Thank you Northfield for such a warm welcome. We had more than 120 folks show up to support the campaign tonight! https://t.co/z4Z61MILwG
What’s so hard about this? Either you value oil executives or working Americans and family farmers. I’ve made my choice. I support biofuels and the farmers who support them.  https://t.co/l3Q86tnHLy

The Shakopee Mdewakanton Sioux community is giving our district a tremendous gift by sharing their cultural heritage at their new Hoċokata Ti. I had an opportunity to stop by the exhibit recently to learn more about the history of this important community. https://t.co/2kdH2RyUAO

When more women are at the decision-making table everyone benefits. Proud to join @CecileRichards in her work to make the voices of women and people of color heard across the country! https://t.co/06strDhIUy

GM's decision to use workers' benefits as leverage in negotiations is heartless especially after concessions workers made to keep GM afloat. After record profits GM workers deserve to be treated with more respect. This is why unions are so important.  https://t.co/hMKLUqB98C

The Administration's war on science has got to stop - automakers don't even want these changes. Thankfully automakers are teaming up against climate change and voluntarily keeping the standards in place for now.  https://t.co/mHv9Fj8qRz
But be clear: I'm going to keep fighting like hell to protect coverage for pre-existing conditions and access to healthcare for millions of Americans.  https://t.co/cCofYfoiyO

At least we can agree on addressing deficits - I remember saying it wasn't a great idea to give away over a trillion dollars that we don't have to big corporations and the super-wealthy.   https://t.co/cCofYfoiyO
I'm proud to stand with the striking @UAW workers fighting for a fair contract with GM. It was @UAW workers who helped GM earn record profits last year. https://t.co/pAvIUteLB7
Two of my favorite people got married yesterday! Congrats to @webertom1 and @peggyflanagan! https://t.co/sUpA3DxhDe

Exciting innovations happening across the nation where schools and employers are teaming up to teach students the skills they need to fill good paying tech jobs. Let's hope for continued success that can be replicated in school districts in Minnesota! https://t.co/DYuKLI4P0f

Minnesota businesses are shutting their doors because this Administration picked big oil executives over blue-collar workers. I will not stop fighting for ethanol and our family farmers.  https://t.co/SGw7MhmMb7

We deserve to know who the White House decided would win at the expense of our farmers and the communities who depend on them. It's time to make the waivers public and put a stop to their misuse! https://t.co/JcLJXEFdJv
The damage from the Administration's secret ethanol waivers is being felt by farmers and producers across Minnesota and the Midwest.   https://t.co/JcLJXEFdJv
It was exciting to see so much support for SD52 this afternoon. They're already working hard to send Matt Klein Rick Hansen and Ruth Richardson back to the legislature! https://t.co/Uqr8efgrII

A little rain didn't stop a great crowd from coming out today for the Teamsters 120 picnic! It was great to see my friend and colleague Tom Emmer there too. Fighting for working families should always be bipartisan! https://t.co/ThOqgdmRAQ
#Skol!
Thanks to everyone in Jordan for a warm welcome and to the volunteers who came out to walk with us in the Heimatfest Parade! https://t.co/ZQYZKiXOzS

What farmers don't need right now is another gut punch from the Administration. We need to make ethanol waivers public so you and I can judge just how "small" these refineries are.  https://t.co/pw2QX1C2xu
Honored to be cheering on the @USWNT tonight in Saint Paul with my friend and colleague @VoteBetty. Go USA! https://t.co/irlhJm3La0
Great to see so many folks out on the Cannon Valley Trail today in Goodhue County. Even got our youngest out for a walk before he starts his junior year tomorrow! https://t.co/yZRIl9h4dC

I'm committed to protecting pensions ending wage theft and job misclassification improving workplace safety passing an infrastructure package that will keep American workers competitive for years to come and fighting until a raise in the minimum wage is law.
It's critical that we build on the hard fought progress of organized labor for American workers.

An exciting @minnesotalynx game made even better by an impromptu visit with @TinaSmithMN and members of the World Cup champions @USWNT. These incredible women like so many in our country still don't have pay equality. It's past time to change that! https://t.co/A5SfLqU2gg

I promised 97-year-old Pauline Carlson that I’d be back to her farm for coffee and stories if I became a member of Congress. She retold her experiences during the Great Depression as we caught up on Carls Hills Farms in Vasa yesterday. Lovely lady. https://t.co/dK4hRDPwLu
It was a great day to be at the State Fair and the perfect time to be talking about 2020 with our friends at the DFL booth and allies at the Labor pavilion! https://t.co/O9YJMRTVIz
Proud to cast my soybean for our next President Amy Klobuchar! https://t.co/Fx5xR5HsrK
Sweet Martha's cookies truly bridge the partisan divide! https://t.co/l0drA9rS01
A lot of energy in SD 54 to re-elect Karla Bigham and Anne Claflin and see a Democrat win in 54B. Thanks for inviting me to say a few words tonight! https://t.co/NSmiBH6nGi

For a decade the GOP has been railing against the ACA and now we're finally seeing what their alternative looks like. The ACA needs some work I'll be the first to admit that but the mess that the Administration is pushing is a problem not a solution.  https://t.co/CZKAr9OaBJ

Thanks for the invite Nate and Pomella to join you and so many great DFLers and Ironworkers from Local 512 at your home in Zumbrota last night! The ribs were seriously great! #unionstrong https://t.co/yCO4zSlkkm

It was great to talk with the folks at Minnesota Soybean Business about the work I'm doing. It was an honor to support the Biodiesel Tax Credit Extension of 2019 because it means that I'm fighting for the farmers like Brad Hovel that I represent.  https://t.co/BbVTYEX8vG
It's time for the Administration to start opening the doors to new markets instead of slamming them shut.

I had the honor of listening to the concerns of farmers from across Minnesota at Farmfest earlier this month. We heard it a lot - farmers are worried that this Administration's trade wars will continue to keep their crops out of markets. https://t.co/KVTy9wP6jr

Packed house in Lakeville last night! Proud to support Matt Little and to introduce the best governor in America Tim Walz. Also for the record my shirt says “re-elect Matt Little and Elect More Women.” https://t.co/r8zRD3sVUn

This is what happens when we give tax cuts to corporations and the super wealthy - working families pay the price for bad policies. Trickle down economics has never and will never work.  https://t.co/QCCOhXj5lD
Stopped in to meet Frankie the latest campaign baby. So cute! https://t.co/3on8EQ4nIm
Tariffs are a tax on Americans. Tariffs are a tax on Americans. Tariffs are a tax on Americans.   https://t.co/mJwVRlYi0e
Congratulations to my long time staffer Chris Megan & Aella on welcoming the newest member of their family this week! I'll be by soon to get my baby fix! https://t.co/nhsmBSM4tF

I'm so proud to announce I've earned the endorsement of @LCVoters. It's an honor to have them fighting by my side as we work to slow climate change and protect our water air and soil from pollution. Thank you for your support! https://t.co/nvoHk5ITMJ

Good to see so many friends and supporters today at the DFL Senior caucus lunch. I didn't even get a chance to eat with all of their great questions. Thank you all for your hard work! https://t.co/c99hF5QwQ6
Thank you to Lynn and Barbara for opening your home today and Sen. Carlson for the great introduction. Grateful to everyone who came out to support the campaign! https://t.co/NyISYRfe9Q
